pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Nordic T1 Refresher Mousse New
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Schwarzkopf Nordic Blonde Refresher Mousse helps to fight against yellow tones between two lightening applications thanks to the neutralising pigments.
The results? A cooler blonde and silky soft hair.

Suitable For: Suitable for lightened, coloured & natural light blonde hair. Not suitable for more than slightly grey hair.

Boxed Contents: 1 Aerosol Can Nordic Blonde
Anti-Yellow Mousse

Size: 92g net

KEY FEATURES

• Refresher mousse with neutralising pigments
• Anti-Yellow effect
• For lightened, coloured & natural blonde hair

Warnings

Extremely flammable aerosol.
Danger. Extremely flammable
aerosol. Pressurised container:
May burst if heated. Keep away
from heat, hot surfaces, sparks,
open flames and other ignition
sources. No smoking. Do not spray
on an open flame or other ignition
source. Do not pierce or burn, even
after use. Protect from sunlight. Do
not expose to temperatures exceeding 50 °C/122°F.
Keep out of reach of children. Use in well ventilated
places. Do not inhale intentionally. Put only fully emptied
can into recycling system (recycling collection).

Ingredients

Ingredients:
Aqua · Butane · Propane · Cetyl Alcohol ·
Cetrimonium Chloride · PPG-5-Ceteth-20 · Parfum
· Isobutane · Methylparaben · Propylparaben ·
Linoleamidopropyl PG-Dimonium Chloride
Phosphate · Propylene Glycol · Linalool · Citric
Acid · HC Blue No. 16 · Citronellol · Basic Red 76 ·
Basic Yellow 57 · Ethanolamine · Benzyl Alcohol

Directions

A COOLER BLONDE IN 5 MINUTES!
1. SHAKE well before use.
2 . APPLY to towel-dried hair.
3 . LEAVE it up to 5 minutes.
4. RINSE hair well with water.

SAFETY DIRECTIONS

Product can cause severe allergic
reactions.
This product contains ingredients which may cause
sensitisation. Read and follow instructions. This product
is not intended for use on persons under the age of 16.
Temporary "black henna" tattoos may increase the risk
of allergy.
Do not colour your hair if:
- you have a rash on your face or sensitive, irritated and
damaged scalp,
- you have ever experienced any reaction after colouring
your hair,
- you have experienced a reaction to a temporary "black
henna" tattoo in the past.
Do not use to dye eyelashes or eyebrows; to do so may
be injurious to the eyes. See bottom of pack for full list
of ingredients. Rinse hair well after application. Avoid
contact with eyes. Rinse immediately if product comes
into contact with them. Avoid unnecessary skin contact.
Keep out of reach of children.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Box & Can (once emptied) can be placed in kerbside recycling bins.
Cap (of the can) cannot be placed in kerbside recycling bins, but can be recycled via TerraCycle.
Visit TerraCycle.com for details.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
